title: Games are finishing too fast and champions deal lots of damage
body:
Ive noticed that all my games are finishing more faster than before.In the past i was able to die very little (as a support - 0/4) maximum deaths. And now im going up top 7. Im feeling like the towers need to be buffed because right now they are like jelly fishes. People can easily destroy towers and sometimes towers get destroyed when the 8 minute hit up. Champions on the other hand deal way too much damage and even my rune setup can't help me much. 

Things to do:

Balance Champion Damage
Buff Towers

replies.body:
well.... Lets break the stuff you want done

balance champion damage:

well lets look at a bursty boi, quinn.

her damage comes from the lethality and crit with the bonus passive dmg, the passive isn't that much if you have a certain amount of tankiness it dosen't do alot, its the lethality and items that make champions strong.

but then we have to realize that DPS champions sacrifice alot of their survivability for DPS, itss not possible to balence a game like this, where new things are added and the game is constantly changed.

Buff towers:

well...
the tower is already pretty strong early game, if a tower is destroyed and 8 minutes its usually due to the lane that the tower belongs to losing too hard, and even late in the game, squishies can still get raped by tower.
